Metadata.home-desc: Slovene Step by Step personalized Slovene lessons tailored to your goals. Learn online at your convenience with experienced teachers and join a supportive community of over 1,200 members. Start today and achieve your language goals with Slovene Step by Step!
Metadata.about-desc: At Slovene Step by Step, we are dedicated to providing personalized Slovenian language learning experiences. Our team of experienced teachers, combined with a flexible schedule, ensures that you can learn at your own pace.

HomePage.under-title: The best way to learn Slovene and make your dreams a reality.
HomePage.why-slovene-text1: Mastering Slovene is the key to unlocking unparalleled opportunities and truly integrating into this vibrant society.
HomePage.why-slovene-text2: Whether you are relocating, studying, or working, learning Slovene makes daily life smoother. From building connections to meeting residency requirements, it is the key to integration. Do not let language barriers hold you back. Learning Slovene is your ticket to a successful, enriched, and fulfilling life in Slovenia.
HomePage.why-slovene-point1: Mastering Slovene is essential for advancing your career in Slovenia. Improve your job prospects by becoming fluent in the local language.
HomePage.why-slovene-point2: Learning Slovene allows you to fully integrate into Slovenian society, making social connections easier and more meaningful.
HomePage.why-slovene-point3: Whether for personal enrichment or academic purposes, fluency in Slovene will open new doors for learning and self-development.
HomePage.why-slovene-text3: Slovene unlocks Slovenia's rich traditions, iconic works like poet France Prešeren's, and authentic connections with locals. It enhances your experience of stunning landscapes like Lake Bled while opening career opportunities in a growing economy. With its unique grammar, Slovene is a rewarding challenge and a way to preserve a rare linguistic heritage.
HomePage.bento-c1-desc: Learn Slovene from the comfort of your home! Our lessons are conducted via Skype, offering flexibility and convenience no matter where you are. Connect with experienced teachers and immerse yourself in engaging, interactive sessions tailored to your goals.
HomePage.bento-c1-desc2: During this lesson you will get acquainted with our methodology, learn the details of the program and get answers to all your questions.
HomePage.bento-c2-desc: Join our vibrant community of over 1,200 learners on Telegram! Share experiences, ask questions, and practice Slovenian with fellow students in a supportive and engaging environment. Learning is better together!
HomePage.bento-c3-title: Support every step of the way
HomePage.bento-c3-desc: Stay on track with help from our dedicated course curator. From answering your questions to providing valuable feedback, we're here to make your learning journey smooth and successful.
HomePage.bento-c4-desc: Achieve your goals faster with a program designed just for you. Whether you're learning for travel, work, or relocation, our tailored approach ensures every lesson is relevant and effective…

Footer.title: The best way to learn Slovene and make your dreams a reality.

Banner.title: ATTENTION
Banner.message: Our website is currently under development! Some features may not be available yet, but we're working hard to bring you the full experience soon. Thank you for your patience!

About us.title: Discover Our Story
About us.subtitle: Building Connections Through Language
About us.text1: At Slovene Step by Step, we help individuals from all backgrounds master new languages and confidently embrace new cultures. Our personalized approach, expert instructors, and supportive community create an engaging learning experience that empowers students to achieve their goals.
About us.text2: Join our community, sign up for a free trial lesson, and take the first step toward achieving your language goals today!
About us.sec2-subtitle: Why We Do What We Do
About us.sec2-par1: At Slovene Step by Step, our mission is to empower individuals from diverse backgrounds by providing personalized, engaging, and effective language learning experiences. We strive to bridge cultural gaps and foster connections by helping our students not only learn a language but also feel at home in their new environments. Through expert guidance, flexible learning options, and a supportive community, we aim to make language learning accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
About us.sec2-par2: We envision a world where language barriers no longer hinder opportunities or integration. What began as a platform to support Russian-speaking migrants navigating life in Slovenia has grown into a vibrant hub for learners from various linguistic and cultural backgrounds.
About us.sec2-par3: Our goal is to become a leading language learning platform in Slovenia and beyond, helping individuals unlock their full potential through language mastery. We aspire to build a global community of learners, united by their passion for growth, connection, and cultural exchange.
About us.sec2-par4: Through innovative teaching methods, dedicated instructors, and a commitment to excellence, Slovene Step by Step continues to pave the way for language learners worldwide.
About us.sec3-par1: We’re a dynamic group of individuals who are passionate about what we do and dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.
About us.sec3-par2: At Slovene Step by Step, our team is made up of passionate educators, experienced linguists, and dedicated support staff who share a common goal: helping our students succeed. Each member brings a unique set of skills and a deep commitment to creating a personalized, engaging learning experience.
About us.sec3-par3: Our tutors, many of whom are native speakers, take pride in guiding students through their language-learning journey, providing support every step of the way. Whether it’s mastering the basics or refining advanced skills, we’re here to inspire confidence, foster growth, and celebrate each milestone.
About us.sec3-par4: Together, we’re more than a team—we’re a community that believes in the power of language to connect, empower, and transform lives.
About us.sec4-par1: The true measure of our success lies in the voices of our students. Through personalized lessons and dedicated guidance, Slovene Step by Step has helped countless individuals achieve their language goals and thrive in their personal and professional lives.
About us.sec4-par2: From newcomers confidently navigating life in Slovenia to professionals expanding their career opportunities, our program has made a lasting impact. Students consistently highlight the supportive environment, the practical language skills they’ve gained, and how the lessons have boosted their confidence and integration into new communities.
About us.sec4-par3: These stories are a testament to the transformative power of language learning, and we’re proud to celebrate every success with our students.
About us.sec5-title: Take the First Step Towards Your Goals
About us.sec5-par1: Ready to start a language-learning journey tailored just for you? Whether you’re looking to improve your skills, connect with a new culture, or gain confidence in your everyday interactions, Slovene Step by Step is here to guide you.
About us.sec5-par2: Sign up for a free trial lesson today and experience firsthand how personalized, engaging, and effective our program can be. Join our growing community of language learners and connect with expert tutors who are passionate about helping you succeed.

Pricing.title: Choose the right plan for you
Pricing.subtitle: Pricing
Pricing.text: Find the perfect plan to master Slovene step by step. Tailored lessons, flexible options, and expert guidance to help you achieve your language goals with ease.
Pricing.plan1-desc: The perfect plan to learn Slovene with a partner, whether a friend, colleague, or family member. Enjoy shared motivation and tailored, interactive lessons.
Pricing.plan1-feature2: Practice with a friend or family member
Pricing.plan2-desc: The perfect plan if you're just getting started with Slovene. Benefit from interactive sessions and flexible scheduling to fit your busy lifestyle.
Pricing.plan2-feature1: One-on-one lessons tailored to your goals
Pricing.plan3-desc: The perfect plan for small groups, ideal for families or friends. Enjoy collaborative lessons with group activities and shared goals for a fun, effective experience.
Pricing.plan3-feature3: Practice with a friend or family member
Pricing.sec2-subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our plans and services. If you can’t find what you’re looking for, feel free to contact
Pricing.sec3-subtitle: Ask us a question or send us a message. We are here to help you.

FAQ.q1: What makes Slovene Step by Step different from other language learning programs?
FAQ.q2: Do I need any prior knowledge of Slovene (or other languages) to start?
FAQ.q4: Can I try a lesson before committing to a full course?
FAQ.a1: Slovene Step by Step offers a personalized learning experience tailored to your needs. We focus on practical communication skills rather than just memorizing vocabulary. Our lessons are interactive and flexible, with experienced tutors who guide you step by step. Whether you’re a beginner or improving your fluency, we ensure a structured and engaging learning journey.
FAQ.a2: Not at all! Our program is designed for all levels, from complete beginners to advanced learners. If you already have some knowledge, we will assess your level and customize the lessons to help you progress efficiently.
FAQ.a3: Our lessons are conducted via live video sessions with experienced tutors. You’ll have interactive exercises, real-time feedback, and customized materials. You can choose your schedule and learn at your own pace, making it easy to fit language learning into your daily routine.
FAQ.a4: Yes! We offer a trial lesson so you can experience our teaching approach firsthand. This helps you understand how our program works and allows us to assess your level and learning goals. Sign up today and start your language journey with confidence!

Testimonials.student-VladLisin: I have been studying for about 6 months now, during which time I have improved my level from zdravo (hello) - hvala (thank you), to full-fledged conversations with Slovenians on a regular basis. I would characterize the teachers as a responsible and professional specialists and therefore I highly recommend this program if you want to learn Slovenian.
Testimonials.student-AnnaKotelnikova: I am learning Slovenian from scratch. I want to thank my teacher for the individual approach, interesting lessons and good explanations of the material. I recommend it to everyone!
Testimonials.student-AlexanderMolchanov: The course is great, I've been studying for six months. It really works. Before that I tried to study on my own - it didn't work.
